titles.title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to use funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation to provide emergency financial assistance to agricultural producers that have incurred income losses in calendar year 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 4/9/2002--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide emergency financial assistance to agricultural producers who have incurred qualifying income losses in 2001, including losses due to army worms.
